website_summaries.verdict: With a 5 yr. replacement policy, it’s hard to go wrong with these heavy-duty knee pads.
pros: Quick-release buckle pads and hook-and-loop straps mean a custom fit that can be removed easily
Soft-gel core covered by sturdy EVA foam padding
Rated very highly in user comfort
cons: The snaps and/or straps don’t hold up with heavy usage in a short period of time on some pairs
Some users find that they don’t stay in place when moving

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, easy to put on and comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I have only used these knee pads once, but they were great. The old ones I had were not sufficiently padded and the metal buckle and thin strap caused difficulty getting and keeping them on and pain and bruising during use. These have wide somewhat padded velcro straps that are easy to strap on, stay in place and are comfortable. I am a thin woman and was afraid these would be too large and bulky, but they are not. I look forward to using them next spring and summer for gardening.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: update: fell apart in 6 weeks
customer_reviews.text: They're comfortable, thick, and haven't scratched the hardwood floor. But for working knee pads, the have a little too much curve across the face. I like the flat fronts for stability. I'll keep them and use them, though. Update: after about 3 weeks of use, the rivet for the upper strap fell off one pad. The next week, the rivet on the other pad fell out while i was walking. Now one is leaking gel...and this is under medium home owner use. Don't bother with them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: feels like you are kneeing on a cloud
customer_reviews.text: I have not had these long to comment on long term durability but I have serious pain if I bend on my left knee. These pad are just amazing. I can be on my knees and be comfortable for hours gardening, and have used them to wash my baseboards and floors. Wish I bought something like this years ago when I didnt have knee problems, would have saved any cartilage for sure.
customer_reviews.author: AnnMarie

customer_reviews.title: It's exactly what I Kneed!
customer_reviews.text: Working as a drywaller required me to be on my knees for a good part of the day. I had gotten to the point where they would swell up to the point where it hurt just to walk (and I'm only twentythree!) I bought these and within a few days the pain and swelling went away! My job became a 100x easier and I could spend so day on my knees!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Having a knee replacement and one remaining bad knee, I needed something functional and comfortable. These gel-layered knee pads are simply the best. They velcro around the back and then at the top the elastic clips on with a very well-constructed clip. They stay in place and don't walk down your leg.
customer_reviews.author: losttherace

customer_reviews.title: There's So Much Padding That They're Hard To Keep Under Your Knees.
customer_reviews.text: Too much padding makes these knee pads hard to stay on top of when I'm "walking" on my knees. I literally fall off of them. It's like walking on high heels except you're on your knees. I spend more time placing them back under my knees than I do actually working. (I'm not very graceful in high heels, either. But, as a 230 pound flooring contractor, I don't get to wear heels very often).
customer_reviews.author: cv hallady

customer_reviews.title: Very soft if you kneel in one place
customer_reviews.text: These are horrible!! First off you would think more cushion is a good thing but these are way too thick. They cause me more back pain because I have to bend further to move things when I’m on my knees. Secondly, why put all of the cushion in the middle. My knees feels like theyre on a rubber ball. Forcing my knee to shift to the side of the knee pad when I shift my weight. Horrible but very soft on my knees.
customer_reviews.author: Kent

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: The knee pads are great. I use them in the garden and house. I can work in the garden for hours without getting up and down. The pads fit well. I have smaller legs than the average man. There is still room enough for larger legs. Update: have bought 3 pairs for gifts. They all love them so far. I don't know if they will last years. Then again none of us are construction workers. Great for in the garden or washing tubs and floors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazing Taste

customer_reviews.title: On My Knees
customer_reviews.text: I do a lot of gardening of irises and stay on my knees several hours at a time. These knee pads stay in place and have been the most comfortable ones I've ever owned (I go through a pair a year minimum), keeping the sandy ground from wearing out the knees of my denim jeans.
customer_reviews.author: HP for Printing

customer_reviews.title: These replaced two failed designs
customer_reviews.text: I have not given these a proper workout but they are much more comfortable than my prior two tries. The fists slipped down unless you made them so tight that it cut off the circulation. The second was lightweight but apparently made for a very small person. I blistered my knees through a pair of jeans. These feel very comfortable. They are made to grip above the knee so they won't fall. And they are lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Brian  Sponaugle

customer_reviews.title: Durable, use the everyday at work
customer_reviews.text: Had these for 3 Years but I lost them left on the back of my truck now it's gone, originally bought these because they looked like DeWalt but for half the price, ultra durable now I am back buying it again
customer_reviews.author: Wade Pryce

customer_reviews.title: Love em.
customer_reviews.text: Best knee pads I have ever owned. Hold in place very well dur to some "gel like" strips on inside of upper pad area. I put these on as soon as I get to work and they feel supportive of my bad knees for my entire 10 hour shifts without being uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Max Imman

customer_reviews.title: I’m soooo happy I found these
customer_reviews.text: They are super comfy, fit great and saved my life... probably literally. Hahaha I made the rookie mistake of trying to save $30 at homedepot by opting out of knee pads to lay vinyl plank flooring... let’s just say, 20 minutes in I figured out quickly why people invest. I felt like I’d been hit by a truck! These knee pads are half the cost and just as good as any expensive pair of knee pads. I am so thrilled with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Misslucas87

customer_reviews.title: GREAT
customer_reviews.text: These are by far the best knee pads that I have purchased in a while. They last, they stay put. No constantly adjusting them. After the first pair I went and ordered the buy 3 for the price of 2 deal. That should be enough.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Ouellette

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable over pant knee pads!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for knee pads that I could quickly take on and off so I needed over pants pads and these fit the bill perfectly. The pads fit snug and secure so walking from place to place is very easy and the gel is very comfortable even on the hardest surfaces. Would not hesitate to order these again, highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: BChinn

customer_reviews.title: Well built, comfortable, and 5 years warranty
customer_reviews.text: I like the comfort. I use these pads when I have my working pants on during spring and fall (cooler days). Very soft, and I am not too concerned that I will run through them because they have a 5 year warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Billy C

customer_reviews.title: So good, I bought another pair!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband. He raved about how comfortable they were and what good cushioning they had. He showed them off to our youngest son who then had to try them on and thought they were fantastic. I bought a second pair to give him when he started a new job! My guys are happy and I can't ask for anything more than that!
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I don't have a great deal of experience with kneepads, but I have used several styles/brands in the past and these are by far the most comfortable that I have used. These were purchased primarily for working in the yard, but I do plan on replacing the flooring in my house and I know these will be perfect for the job.
customer_reviews.author: willeycoyote

customer_reviews.title: NOPE...
customer_reviews.text: If it hadn't taken me almost two months to try them I would have sent them back. Very good quality, but, they crawl down my legs (like most). Perhaps they are ok if one is not wearing shorts (?) I had not tried them because, in the same order, I bought REXBETI knee pads. Love them; have ordered two more pairs!
customer_reviews.author: Tim from Tuckerton

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as claims
customer_reviews.text: Fit is off. Don't stay where you need them. Roll and move while wearing. When in your knees, you didn't need to also be fighting your knee pads. Constantly rolling, sooooooo, then so do your knees.
customer_reviews.author: HG

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: The gel pad really makes a difference. I bought a lesser quality pad for lighter duty jobs along with this purchase. I much rather use these, especially if I'm on concrete or any hard surface. Sure helps save the knees. At 65, mine are almost shot and need all the help I can provide.
customer_reviews.author: petsrus

customer_reviews.title: Knee pads that work!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband wanted these knee pads for Fathers Day. I went to the Amazon website, looked at all available and chose these. My husband is very pleased and thought they wouldn’t fit his stocky legs. Then he saw the extension pieces, and now they fit perfectly. These are very sturdy and work great!!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn W Smith

customer_reviews.title: NOT as good as the earlier version
customer_reviews.text: I liked the older version that had a D ring and clip post to secure the adjustable upper strap. This newer version has an add on velcro strap that is uncomfortable. The bare velcro tends to poke and irrate. It does not secure the pads as well as the earlier version did. I doubt the add on velcro strap will last as long as the older version.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional knee pads
customer_reviews.text: I used these knee pads installing faced insulation in my attic. They were so comfortable I was quickly able to get the old insulation ripped out and new ones installed. It's highly recommend buy yourself a pair, you won't is feel them there.
customer_reviews.author: Import

customer_reviews.title: Knee Pads
customer_reviews.text: I'm using these knee pads when working around my bushes and other plants. I like the strap combination that holds the knee pads in place. The knee pads are comfortable to wear. The old knee pads I had, I could wear less than 10 minutes. These I wore for 1 hour. I made sure I took a break to give my knees and hips a rest. I would recommend these knee pads for anyone interested in a comfortable knee pad.
customer_reviews.author: S David

customer_reviews.title: For accident-prone coworkers!
customer_reviews.text: Industrial, heavy-duty and perfect! It's also easy to place at the knee and protects very well! My coworker has stopped expressing pain since I got her these (and made her wear them) and I'm happy for her poor knees. Those office desk won't break her kneecaps again. Good-bye bruises! Hooray!
customer_reviews.author: Sarita B.

customer_reviews.title: didn't stay in place
customer_reviews.text: The knee pads were comfortable but , they moved around when i walk in them have to readjust every time i kneel down , very annoying . They didn't fall down just side to side movement . I tightened the straps still moved on me . Not a happy customer
customer_reviews.author: bimyah

customer_reviews.title: Location is Important
customer_reviews.text: Very good protection for the the knees. My problem is that they slip off of the knee and I have to keep pulling them up. They are great when they are properly located
customer_reviews.author: JohnSailor

customer_reviews.title: No kneeling for old men...
customer_reviews.text: If you are young and wear 'skinny jeans' then these might work. They will not stay up on my husky lower thighs. Tighten them up and the discomfort and pain becomes unbearable upon lowering to ground. They will sell at a garage sale (?).
customer_reviews.author: NomadMan

customer_reviews.title: It does the job but can be improved
customer_reviews.text: I like how the pad cups the knee with as much area as the gel allows to distribute the pressure of kneeling for maximum comfort. Strapping a pad to the knee is quick and easy; however due to the “simple” strap design, the pad tends to slip downward and away with repeated bending/straightening of the leg. It’s simple enough to tug the pad upward and back into the comfort position but it’s a nuisance; hence, I rate it 4 of 5. A small design change can fix this flaw.
customer_reviews.author: ATorres

customer_reviews.title: Torn Seam Above Knee
customer_reviews.text: Knee pads did all like I thought and read, who knows that I might have just gotten a badly sown one. Having a tuff time to email sender and explain my mishap, hopefully they can send another pair,thanks gn
customer_reviews.author: glenn a.

customer_reviews.title: They fit well and are super easy to put on
customer_reviews.text: They fit well and are super easy to put on. The gel feels awesome. So looking forward to no more painful kneeling.
customer_reviews.author: James D. Greenwood

customer_reviews.title: Awesome fit
customer_reviews.text: Awesome fit I would recommend was skeptical about upper strap feeling well but now I would recommend great fit
customer_reviews.author: Homemaint2018

customer_reviews.title: I’ve been buying Home Depot knee pads for years, these pads are better!!
customer_reviews.text: I like these knee pads, they don’t slip or pinch me, I l like the Velcro straps. I wish they had a size smaller, the Velcro over laps on my legs, I’m a skinny guy.
customer_reviews.author: Martin vega

customer_reviews.title: Kneesaver, but...
customer_reviews.text: In my job, I hafta kneel on rocks and asphalt all day. These things are awsome. UPDATE: After three weeks of use, upper fastener broke. Would be perfect if it had a wider velcro upper strap similar to the bottom. Also needs to be wider up top so it wont roll and slip down your leg.
customer_reviews.author: SRC670

customer_reviews.title: Still digs into the back of your knee
customer_reviews.text: I have tried so many knee pads, this is my final pair I will ever buy and not for good reasons. Yes they have better strap locations but the top strap still digs in and hurts like any other style. They also don't lay flat on the ground so they start to rotate around my leg when kneeling making things worse.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: One happy painter
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my husband even though he refused to buy it since he "has" a pair kneepads but cant seem to find it lol. He tried them on and boy were they a hit! Comfortable and great amount of padding that you dont feel like your putting pressure on your knees. Now he's one happy painter!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Won't Stay Up
customer_reviews.text: Always excited for a new and hopeful fully functional knee pads. Yes; these pads are Super Comfortable when on the floor. They refuse to stay up on your legs or knees when getting up and back down. Spent more time and vocabulary cussing these pads than worth the money I spent. Threw them across the Room-Going in the Garbage. Timetable for the return was only thirty days-Oh well.
customer_reviews.author: T. Smythe

customer_reviews.title: The pads are suuuper comfortable and very impact resistant
customer_reviews.text: One of the snaps started to fray after a week, but it continues to work well a month in. The pads are suuuper comfortable and very impact resistant. I can kneel without worry of discomfort from quickly going down on one knee. But.... They don't stay in place well and after a few times up and down or walking for awhile will slide left or right when moving along on your knees. I find myself readjusting them at least 8 times a shift.
customer_reviews.author: Keia V. Gray

customer_reviews.title: Knee Pads
customer_reviews.text: Gave these to my man for work, great quality and he loved them!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Simonds

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the knee pads until the button broke off the day after the last day to return it i only had them for 30 days using them at work three days a week 4 hours a day I had to buy new knee pads I’m very upset that I could not return them after only a short time of use and had to buy new ones
customer_reviews.author: Tereon Crowder

customer_reviews.title: FEEL GREAT
customer_reviews.text: I have only tried them on so far and haven't actually worked with them. Maybe next week I will be able to start the project I bought them for.
customer_reviews.author: MONDAK

customer_reviews.title: They work as described!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time owning or using knee pads. They are fantastic.....I'm installing a new kitchen floor and while other body parts my have been sore my knees were fine. I plan on using them for gardening and washing floors too.
customer_reviews.author: suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My father is 72 years old and stocks groceries at Food Lion 40 hours a week he loves these so you definitely did a good job designing these nee pads! 5 stars all the way around from materials ,comfort to price! Great deal!
customer_reviews.author: Kendall Leech

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Bought them for gardening. They work very well and are much more convenient than constantly moving the little foam pads they you can buy for the same purpose. Very happy with my purchase and based on the usage over the last several weeks I expect to get several years' worth of use out of these.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Winkler

customer_reviews.title: really saves my knees!
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Tough, durable, and comfortable. I do sweat in them but they save my knees so much discomfort that I do not mind the sweating. Great price for an awesome product!
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Great knee pads!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these!!! I'm a retail merchandiser, it's a physical job. Sometimes it's requires getting on my knees after awhile they start to hurt through the day. These pads were so comfortable. My coworkers even want a pair of these pads.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Durable, easy to take on and off. Protects the knee well.
customer_reviews.text: Fits well! Durable, and east to take on and off.
customer_reviews.author: Katy

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: When I used these I could hardly tell when I was on my knees. Worked great when we installed my dad's kitchen floor. Great product with lots of padding, definitely saved my knees!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Riddle

customer_reviews.title: Makes being on your knees comfortable
customer_reviews.text: After using this product while repairing a riding lawn mower that required a lot of kneeling, I'm ashamed not to have had knee pads in my DIY kit a long long time ago. I don't know why I always thought of them being used only by people laying carpet. Better late than never. Nicely made, comfortable and fairly priced.
customer_reviews.author: CDL

customer_reviews.title: KNEE PADS
customer_reviews.text: Only wish is that the knee portion had a bit more flexibility. Other than that an excellent product that stays put when you put it on.
customer_reviews.author: CHRISTINE WELTON

customer_reviews.title: They work!!!  I can get on my knees and have no pain.
customer_reviews.text: I use them to get on the floor to exercise. I am so pleased with themI freely give them a great recommendation.
customer_reviews.author: BeverlyB

customer_reviews.title: Amazing, need longer softened velcro strip for big folk!
customer_reviews.text: This was so perfect to save my knees on shoots!!! But I wish the had better or longer velcro, as it didn't fit comfortable since I’m 300lbs of heavenly joy.
customer_reviews.author: DRAC

customer_reviews.title: wearing out faster than I'd like
customer_reviews.text: I'm a vehicle inspector and get down onto my knees maybe 20 times a day for about 5 seconds at a time. The straps are wearing out and the right knee pad no longer stays in place. I've only had them for about 5 months. But hey, they protect my knees
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: No constant adjusting!
customer_reviews.text: I really like the ease on getting the knee pads on my legs. In the last 6 months I have used 2 other brands of knee pads and both were very uncomfortable I was always having to adjust which I do not have to do with these premium knee pads.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Awesome.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my boyfriend. He is a carpenter and he says they are the best knee pads he has ever had and will ever need. He loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the money
customer_reviews.text: I wore them for the first time this past weekend. They performed well. My knees were well protected and didn't get sore at all. If I had anything negative to say it would be that there was a little too much padding. But all in all, I liked them. I'm hoping that the upper strap attachment point holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Miracle is it fits anyone
customer_reviews.text: The straps are strategically located so the when you kneel down they bunch up in the back of your knee. In other words they are too short if you have any claves at all. Otherwise comfortable and stable if the straps are tight
customer_reviews.author: Aramovich

customer_reviews.title: Safty First
customer_reviews.text: Saves the knees, a must if working any hard positions. Or house work even.
customer_reviews.author: Kristoper M.

customer_reviews.title: Great knee pads
customer_reviews.text: Great knee pads for all you diy projects, crawl spaces and Attic space. Looking for really big, comfortable and good quality knee guards and found these. Great product
customer_reviews.author: Raman

customer_reviews.title: Love them! Super comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Probably the most comfortable knee pads I've ever worn,and provide pretty good protection! Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: I get them for at Mom's house for in the summer time
customer_reviews.text: They are heavy and durable I have not tried it on to work with. We are all snow covered!
customer_reviews.author: Jason Burrell

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and right price
customer_reviews.text: Great fit and great price. Comfortable for extended periods. Working on my third pair! Can't beat the comfort for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Javi

customer_reviews.title: Great knee pads
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect for us. Super easy to put on and very comfortable with plenty of padding. The second day if wearing them was a little uncomfortable and caused some irritation. Nothing too terrible though.
customer_reviews.author: Eiram

customer_reviews.title: Save your knees
customer_reviews.text: They are comfortable and much needed and fits without binding or pinching.
customer_reviews.author: KEVIN DURANT

customer_reviews.title: Comfort while painting baseboards.
customer_reviews.text: The knee pads work well on old boney legs while on the floor painting baseboards in my house. The padding is excellent and adjustment is very easy.
customer_reviews.author: S. Cathcart

customer_reviews.title: Not so premium
customer_reviews.text: My wife used these for helping me install our flooring. 1100 square feet. She didn't like them. They were not comfortable, difficult to put on/take off. They also ripped and she can't use them anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Chris R.

customer_reviews.title: Stay in place.
customer_reviews.text: Just like most, you need to keep the bottom strap loose to stop it from digging into the back of your knees. But so far they seem to stay in place.
customer_reviews.author: michael loes

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a good product so far.
customer_reviews.text: Dear Karol and Co., I have been trying to find comfortable, wearable, and durable knee pads. These are very comfortable and appear to be well made. They are enscribed with date of service and will keep you posted on results! I'm excited.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Zelina

customer_reviews.title: Husband absolutely loves them!
customer_reviews.text: He has been doing outside work which requires him to kneel a lot. He said they are super comfortable and help with the discomfort of kneeling!!
customer_reviews.author: Glenda

customer_reviews.title: These didn't work for me....
customer_reviews.text: These didn't work for me, they weren't comfortable at all;perhaps because they didn't fit too well on me, the scrapes were too short, I even brought extensions and they weren't still a good fit
customer_reviews.author: Z. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Best Kneepads ever!
customer_reviews.text: I work for an airline and do alot of work in the cargo hold of the plane, whers we stack bags or unload them. These kneepads are the best I have ever owned! They are so comfortable and I have reccomend them to my co workers and they all love them!!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Grimm

customer_reviews.title: Great fitting knee pads
customer_reviews.text: They fit great and don't slide down like others I've had before. They are easy to clean mud and other debris from.
customer_reviews.author: Butch Renyer

customer_reviews.title: Very happy to buy
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous knee pads! Very convenient. Do not fall from the knee. Soft backing. Very happy to buy. I advise everyone to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Dreych

customer_reviews.title: Bad knees, these helped
customer_reviews.text: I've got bad knees from an old injury. Had to do some weeding. These helped with the pain and discomfort. Really comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Uzma

customer_reviews.title: I would buy them again!
customer_reviews.text: They are perfect fits very comfortable and soft on the knees and priced very nicely for the product you get.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Shouldn't have to wait 6 days on prime
customer_reviews.text: Still didn't come now I hear couple more days . 6 days out now.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Boyfriend got these he was excited to receive them for work!
customer_reviews.author: Marieee

customer_reviews.title: They're pretty easy to put on and take off
customer_reviews.text: Just got these and had time to wear them a couple of times. They're pretty easy to put on and take off, really easy to adjust and are exceptionally comfortable. Looks like they will serve me well for quite a while.
customer_reviews.author: P. Colbert

customer_reviews.title: Really well made for the price, lasted longer than I needed them to.
customer_reviews.text: Extremely durable, was pretty much in the same shape I got it in after months of use, ran them through the washer a couple of times even though I think it said not to, was fine. gave them to a friend and they use them everyday at work.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: My dad like them
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my eighty years old dad to replace his old ones. He told me they are very good and reliable. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth  Morrow

customer_reviews.title: Knees for life!
customer_reviews.text: Best ones yet I lay carpet I know! Nice behind the knees and easy to get off. Not to grippy on the knee pad!
customer_reviews.author: Joe Baker

customer_reviews.title: They are so comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I used my knee pads for a tile job i was doing on a property and it was like a dream no hurting knees
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for tiling, comfy on my skinny legs! My old knee pad straps crawled and rubbed my legs raw...... the design on these pads are perfect and stay in place around my legs. Great product and would definitely buy them again when needed.
customer_reviews.author: sheila stout

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quality knee pads.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality knee pads. Bought them after reading other reviews and trusting in the product design and description. Not disappointed and would buy them again. Wife uses them in retail, so a lot of bending and stooping. She loves them as she has no more pain.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I got them for my girlfriend for gardening. Though she hasn't actually used them in the yard she and I both tried them on and they are very comfortable. They are very well made and durable looking.
customer_reviews.author: Don M.

customer_reviews.title: My knees hitting the hardwood or even rug is a ...
customer_reviews.text: My knees hitting the hardwood or even rug is a hurtful thing. Sometimes when tidying up, you have to do it. These pads have made a difference in alleviating the discomfort.
customer_reviews.author: Maria C. Ginart

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for a bad knee!
customer_reviews.text: I have a bad knee which has been problematic the last few years. These knee pads seem to do the trick. I am working down on my knees, putting down decking, without discomfort. The only reason I did not do 5 stars is I want to see how long they last, how durable, and how my knee does over an extended period.
customer_reviews.author: DON-SC

customer_reviews.title: Works great for a time, then degrades rapidly
customer_reviews.text: Editing my original review because of the passage of time. The Knee Pads lasted about a month before the straps started to fall apart, I've had to sew them back together several times over now and now I can't any longer. Moreover, the gel in the pads has ruptured whatever containment they have and it leaks regularly, leaving a rather disgusting mess on my pants. Honestly I can't say I'd recommend them to anyone expecting them to work more than a couple of months.
customer_reviews.author: Ekarus

customer_reviews.title: They work great. needs a bit of trying around to adjust ...
customer_reviews.text: They work great. needs a bit of trying around to adjust the straps so that they hold well without being uncomfortable, but once the sweet spot is found, there is no problems. I spent hours working on my deck and garden on my knees, and my knees were very happy to have those.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Vidoudez

customer_reviews.title: Pad Movement
customer_reviews.text: The pads are very thick and provide a good cushion. Unfortunately, the straps do not hold the pads into position for very long and the pads have to be re-positioned back over the knee frequently.
customer_reviews.author: Peter M. Garg

customer_reviews.title: Bulky Knee pads
customer_reviews.text: Good quality but I prefer something a little thinner that doesn't need to be on so tight without moving around
customer_reviews.author: Kleetz

customer_reviews.title: Great knee pads!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my boyfriend for work he loves them and says they are exceptionally comfortable with the gel in the knees. He said they've made a huge difference great product!
customer_reviews.author: K.T. from PA

customer_reviews.title: No more painful knees
customer_reviews.text: I have bad knees and these things make life so much easier. Wish I would have got them sooner.
customer_reviews.author: OHGREATONE2

customer_reviews.title: These knee pads are some of the best
customer_reviews.text: I like the knee pads because they are so comfortable. I enjoy that I feel confident wearing them since they are very tough and have a cool color which stands out so they would be easy to find if you leave them lying somewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Andres Vera

customer_reviews.title: Very well made
customer_reviews.text: It is hard surface and soft inside so not so much pain when on your knees. The smaller strap kind of hurts but I don’t click it and there isn’t much problem.
customer_reviews.author: Connides

customer_reviews.title: Not for average legs
customer_reviews.text: Better have skinny legs or these will NOT FIT!!!! Missed the return date by 2 days so big waste of money for me!!
customer_reviews.author: Debsters1

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: So far so good and looks promising; time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Brisendine

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Knee pads work great and feel comfortable as I have worked most of the day with them.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Kester

customer_reviews.title: Great work gear
customer_reviews.text: I love how protective they are. Great for work. I wish that working knee pads didn't bond so much when squaring. My volleyball pads are more comfortable but not as protective and durable Of we could combine the copper knee sleeve, volleyball pads and these, this old lady would be estatic.
customer_reviews.author: Brook Guidry

product_meta.title: Premium Knee Pads For Seniors, Men and Women (Knee pad for Work, Gardening, Construction & Flooring) Extremely Comfortable, Heavy-Duty Kneepads. W/Buckle Clips & Velcro Straps to Stay in Place.
feature_bullets: TIGHT & SECURE FIT TO PREVENT KNEEPAD FROM SLIPPING DOWN. If your job or your projects require a lot of "knee time" each knee pad will stay in place all day long with our improved adjustable velcro straps. Also, the quick release slip buckle clips make putting on and taking off your kneepads a walk in the park.

SAFEGUARD YOUR KNEES LONG TERM WITH REAL COMFORT. Our soft gel core and durable EVA foam padding cushion kneepad plus the heavy-duty thick poly shield and its ergonomic design make each of our knee pad perfect to work on any hard surface and protect your knees long term. TRY OUR RIVALS' TOO. You'll be surprised!

GIVE YOUR KNEES THE RELIEF THEY NEED. Let's face it, your knees are not getting any younger, but you need to keep hustling. We're here to help. Just grab our cushioned and durable knee pads and work in comfort for an extended time.

PERFECT FOR ANY JOB OR HOBBY. Ideal for working on concrete and hardwood floors, construction work, flooring and carpet installations, welding, stocking shelves, gardening, cleaning, and more. Heavy-weight nylon thread ensures long-lasting durability. 600D polyester mesh breathes for all-day comfort

TRY THEM FOR 1,825 DAYS (or 5 long years) and If something doesn’t feel RIGHT just contact us directly and we'll send a free replacement or we'll refund you and you can KEEP them. What are you waiting for? Add to Cart Now, try them today and worst-case scenario you'll get a pair of knee pads on our dime.
